Articles.Content:
The original: http://www.bay12forums.com/smf/index.php?topic=99886.0, by Kitten Snot

This game is about being Patient Zero of a zombie apocalypse, leading your zombie horde to victory over humans. But how did you come to this fate? (hint, not by a zombie, you are supposed to be the first one)

How to play: I will be your wonderful GM. Don't expect a good story, I will be making things up as we go. Your luck will be determined by the roll of a 20-sided die in real life. I shall explain a situation, and you will make up a response to said situation. You will have some stats to determine how alive, tired, hungry, etc. you are. Here are your stats:

Health: 15/15

Hunger: 25/25 (25/25 means full, 1/25 means desperately hungry, etc.)

Energy: 10/10 (the lower the first number is, the more tired you are,you need sleep)

Stuff: Wallet, $15, clothes, driver's license, credit card, jeans, tennis shoes, white t-shirt(inventory)

Now make up how your character got infected, name is optional. Have fun! (please don't use the original as a cheat sheet.)

Humans. Pesky living things... they think they are so smart...

I don't remember my name. But I like to be called Zero.

I am Patient Zero.

I am the start of the end, of the upbringing.

But I don't look like one of those things.

I was infected 3 months ago. I didn't understand it then. I was a weak human.

It was an experiment, snatched up from my own home and tested on. I was pretty poor, then. Now I travel across the world, spreading the infection, others unknowing of my abillities.

My infection can't be spotted through microscopes or other human tech.

...Ahem...

Okay, I hate talking like that. Anyways, I'm trying to kill everyone with this infection, I don't look like a zombie, and can't be detected as a zombie, unless they see me eating someone or something.

Zombiesm is a common thing now, just a really bad but common infection. The first few people infected are similar to me, but I can control all zombies.

I can change my face and body at anytime, so I can't be tracked.

Well, I'm running from CDC agents now, so AAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!
